mapper.select: select find_code_name(100, v.dcode) as division, v.CREDIT,v.grade, v.lname,p.pname, p.email, p.PPHONE, l.*, m.DNAME, m.MNAME, r.LRNAME, p.PSTATUS, s.* from lecture_info v, LECTURE l, professor p, MAJOR_VIEW m, LECTURE_ROOM r, study_plan s where v.LNUM = l.LNUM and s.opennum = l.opennum and l.pid = p.pid and p.mcode = m.mcode and l.LRCODE = r.LRCODE and l.PID = #{pid} and l.opennum = #{opennum}
SELECT distinct l.lyear FROM lecture l LEFT OUTER JOIN study_plan p ON p.OPENNUM=l.OPENNUM JOIN lecture_info i on l.lnum=i.LNUM WHERE l.pid=#{pid} ORDER BY l.lyear desc

SELECT distinct i.lname "lname"
FROM lecture l LEFT OUTER JOIN study_plan p ON p.OPENNUM=l.OPENNUM JOIN lecture_info i on l.lnum=i.LNUM WHERE l.pid=#{pid}
